The Cutest Couples at the 2017 CMA Awards

Country Living editors select each product featured. If you buy from a link, we may earn a commission. More about us.

Getty Images Check out your favorite couples and twosomes making their way down the red carpet at the 2017 Country Music Association Awards. View Gallery 17 Photos Getty Images 1 of 17 Faith Hill and Tim McGraw Getty Images 2 of 17 Morgane and Chris Stapleton Getty Images 3 of 17 Caroline Boyer and Luke Bryan Getty Images 4 of 17 Anderson East and Miranda Lambert Getty Images 5 of 17 Kimberly Williams-Paisley and Brad Paisley Getty Images 6 of 17 Gabi Dugal and Scotty McCreery Getty Images 7 of 17 Lauren Akins and Thomas Rhett Getty Images 8 of 17 Mike Fisher and Carrie Underwood Getty Images Getty Images 9 of 17 Morgan Evans and Kelsea Ballerini Getty Images 10 of 17 Abby Law and Dan Smyers with Shay Mooney and Hannah Billingsley Getty Images 11 of 17 Lee Brice and Sara Reeveley Getty Images 12 of 17 Kyle Jacobs and Kellie Pickler Getty Images 13 of 17 Cam and Adam Weaver Getty Images 14 of 17 Darius Rucker and Beth Leonard Getty Images 15 of 17 Maren Morris and Ryan Hurd Getty Images 16 of 17 Kimberly and Aaron Watson Getty Images 17 of 17 Dierks Bentley and Cassidy Black Next 2017 CMA Awards Red Carpet Fashion Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
